named-query.name: BC_READ_FIRST_SHIPPING_RATE_BY_FEE_TYPES
named-query.query: SELECT shippingRate FROM org.broadleafcommerce.pricing.domain.ShippingRate shippingRate WHERE shippingRate.feeType = :feeType AND shippingRate.feeSubType = :feeSubType AND shippingRate.bandUnitQuantity > :bandUnitQuantity ORDER BY band_unit_qty
